dc.title: Thorium Reader Documentation in English (3.0.1)
dc.creator: EDRLab
dc.description: This is the official Thorium 3.0.1 documentation. It offers guidance to help you get to know and make better use of Thorium Reader. Quick support references are not includced here and are available online from the Thorium Support webpages.
